summary: Successfully completed 8 commits. Committed 8 file change(s)

commits.message:
refactor(config): remove secondary provider and openai preferred model

Remove secondary LLM provider configuration by setting provider, model,
endpoint, and API key environment variable to null. Also remove the
preferred_model from the OpenAI provider configuration to simplify
settings and avoid outdated model references.

chore(kcmt): update last run results

Updated the last run log to reflect a new execution processing 8 files
instead of 2, with all commits failing due to LLM unavailability after 3
attempts. Duration decreased slightly, and rate increased. This captures
the outcome of running kcmt on additional files including benchmark.py,
cli.py, main.py, and provider drivers.

refactor(benchmark): add model count tracking and simplify code

Add provider_model_counts and total_runs variables to track model counts
per provider and total benchmark runs. Simplify list comprehension and
cost calculation for better readability and remove unnecessary blank
lines.

refactor(cli): add type hint and simplify filter logic

Add type annotation for providers variable and refine condition to check
for string type and truthiness. Simplify model_filter and
provider_filter assignments into concise single-line expressions for
improved readability.

fix(openai): use timezone-aware timestamp to avoid deprecation

Update datetime handling to use fromtimestamp with UTC timezone,
replacing deprecated utcfromtimestamp to prevent warnings.

fix(xai): use timezone-aware UTC timestamps

Replace utcfromtimestamp with fromtimestamp(tz=UTC) to ensure timestamps
are timezone-aware, preventing potential issues with date handling in
different environments.

feat(tests): add mock fixture for Anthropic messages API

Add an autouse pytest fixture that intercepts httpx.post calls to
Anthropic's messages API, returning a stubbed response to prevent real
network calls during tests that don't explicitly mock the endpoint. This
ensures test isolation while leaving other providers untouched.

subjects: refactor(config): remove secondary provider and openai preferred model
refactor(benchmark): add model count tracking and simplify code
refactor(cli): add type hint and simplify filter logic
fix(openai): use timezone-aware timestamp to avoid deprecation
feat(tests): add mock fixture for Anthropic messages API
